1: -module(hty_inte_SUITE).
    2: -compile(export_all).
    3: 
    4: all() -> [
    5:     hello,
    6:     {group, accesslog},
    7:     {group, 'catch'},
    8:     {group, move},
    9:     {group, history},
   10:     {group, static},
   11:     {group, staticlisting},
   12:     {group, vhosts},
   13:     {group, xslpi}
   14: ].
   15: 
   16: groups() -> [
   17:     {accesslog, [
   18:       accesslog_check_request_logged
   19:     ]},
   20:     {'catch', [
   21:         catch_forward
   22:     ]},
   23:     {history, [
   24:       history_empty,
   25:       history_unparsable_body,
   26:       history_post_and_reread,
   27:       history_get_latest,
   28:       history_get_earlier,
   29:       history_expect_conflict
   30:     ]},
   31:     {move, [
   32:         move_file,
   33:         move_folder
   34:     ]},
   35:     {static, [
   36:         static_get_rootfile,
   37:         static_get_subfile,
   38:         static_index_txt_welcome,
   39:         static_get_rootindex,
   40:         static_get_subindex
   41:     ]},
   42:     {staticlisting, [
   43:         staticlisting_list_root,
   44:         staticlisting_list_sub,
   45:         staticlisting_prefer_welcomefile
   46:     ]},
   47:     {vhosts, [
   48:       vhosts_basic,
   49:       vhosts_subdomains
   50:     ]},
   51:     {xslpi, [
   52:       xslpi_basic
   53:     ]}
   54: ].
   55: 
   56: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   57:     ok = inets:start(),
   58:     Config.
   59: 
   60: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   61:     ok = inets:stop(),
   62:     Config.
   63: 
   64: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   65:     Groupname = atom_to_list(Group),
   66:     Groupdir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config) ++ Groupname,
   67:     Fromdir = Groupdir ++ "/fixture",
   68:     Todir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config) ++ Groupname ++ "/fixture",
   69:     copy_fixture(Fromdir, Todir),
   70:     {ok, _Pid} = hty_main:start([Todir]),
   71:     [{wwwroot, Todir},
   72:      {files_dir, Groupdir ++ "/files"}|Config].
   73: 
   74: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   75:     ok = hty_main:stop(),
   76:     Config.
   77: 
   78: init_per_testcase(Test, Config) ->
   79:     io:format(user, "About to start httpc with profile ~p~n", [Test]),
   80:     {ok, _} = inets:start(httpc, [{profile, Test}]),
   81:     [{tc_name, Test}|Config].
   82: 
   83: end_per_testcase(Test, _Config) ->
   84:     %Httpcpid = proplists:get_value(httpc_pid, Config, no_httpc_pid_config),
   85:     ok = inets:stop(httpc, Test).
   86: 
   87: %%% Support
   88: copy_fixture(From, To) ->
   89:     case filelib:is_dir(From) of
   90:         true ->
   91:             filelib:ensure_dir(To),
   92:             file:make_dir(To),
   93:             {ok, Filenames} = file:list_dir(From),
   94:             lists:foreach(fun(Filename) ->
   95:                 copy_fixture(From ++ "/" ++ Filename, To ++ "/" ++ Filename)
   96:             end, Filenames);
   97:         false ->
   98:             ok = filelib:ensure_dir(To),
   99:             io:format("Copying from ~s to ~s", [From, To]),
  100:             {ok, _} = file:copy(From, To)
  101:     end.
  102: 
  103: -record(exchange, {
  104:     method = get,
  105:     req_headers = [],
  106:     req_file = none,
  107:     req_body = none,
  108:     url = no_url,
  109:     status = 200,
  110:     rsp_headers = [],
  111:     rsp_body = no_rsp_body,
  112:     rsp_file = no_rsp_file,
  113:     rsp_pattern = no_rsp_pattern,
  114:     entity_compare = strict :: strict | trimmed
  115: }).
  116: 
  117: run_test(Exchanges, Config) ->
  118:     Testcase = proplists:get_value(tc_name, Config),
  119:     run_test(Testcase, Exchanges, Config).
  120: 
  121: run_test(Test, Exchange, Config) when is_record(Exchange, exchange) ->
  122:   run_test(Test, [Exchange], Config);
  123: run_test(Test, Exchanges, Config) when is_list(Exchanges) ->
  124:     Filesdir = proplists:get_value(files_dir, Config)
  125:       ++ "/" ++ atom_to_list(Test) ++ "/",
  126:     lists:foreach(fun(X) ->
  127:         Request = case {X#exchange.req_file, X#exchange.req_body} of
  128:           {none, none} -> {
  129:               X#exchange.url,
  130:               X#exchange.req_headers
  131:           };
  132:           {Reqfile, none} -> {
  133:               X#exchange.url,
  134:               X#exchange.req_headers,
  135:               proplists:get_value("content-type",
  136:                 X#exchange.req_headers, "application/octet-stream"),
  137:               hty_result:assume_ok(file:read_file(Filesdir ++ Reqfile))
  138:           };
  139:           {none, Reqbody} -> {
  140:             X#exchange.url,
  141:             X#exchange.req_headers,
  142:             proplists:get_value("content-type",
  143:               X#exchange.req_headers, "application/octet-stream"),
  144:             case is_binary(Reqbody) of
  145:               true -> Reqbody;
  146:               false -> list_to_binary(Reqbody)
  147:             end
  148:           };
  149:           {_,_} -> error(dont_specify_both_req_file_and_req_body)
  150:         end,
  151:         {ok, Response} = httpc:request(
  152:             X#exchange.method,
  153:             Request,
  154:             [], % HttpOptions
  155:             [{body_format, binary}], % Options
  156:             Test),
  157:         {{_, Status, StatusMessage}, ResponseHeaders, Body} = Response,
  158:         case X#exchange.status of
  159:             undefined -> ok;
  160:             Status -> ok;
  161:             _ -> notok = io:format("Wrong status [~p ~p]~n", [Status, StatusMessage])
  162:         end,
  163:         lists:foreach(fun({Name, Value}) ->
  164:             io:format("Looking for header ~s=~s in ~p~n", [Name, Value, ResponseHeaders]),
  165:             true = lists:member({Name, Value}, ResponseHeaders)
  166:         end, X#exchange.rsp_headers),
  167: 
  168:         case X#exchange.rsp_pattern of
  169:           no_rsp_pattern -> ok;
  170:           Pattern ->
  171:             case re:compile(Pattern) of
  172:               {ok, Mp} ->
  173:                 case re:run(Body, Mp) of
  174:                   {match, _} -> ok;
  175:                   nomatch ->
  176:                    throw({error, ["Expected match against ", Pattern, " but got ", Body]})
  177:                 end;
  178:               {error, {Error, Pos}} ->
  179:                 throw({error, ["Bad regex", Error, Pos]})
  180:             end
  181:         end,
  182: 
  183:         case X#exchange.rsp_body of
  184:             no_rsp_body -> ok;
  185:             Body -> ok;
  186:             OtherBody ->
  187:               case X#exchange.entity_compare of
  188:                 strict -> 
  189:                   throw({error, ["Expected ", Body, " but got ", OtherBody]});  
  190:                 trimmed -> trim_compare(OtherBody, Body)
  191:               end
  192:         end,
  193:         case X#exchange.rsp_file of
  194:             no_rsp_file -> ok;
  195:             Filename ->
  196:                 Filepath = Filesdir ++ Filename,
  197:                 io:format("Reading facit file ~s~n", [Filepath]),
  198:                 {ok, Facit} = file:read_file(Filepath),
  199:                 io:format("About to compare facit [~s]~n with response body [~s]~n", [Facit, Body]),
  200:                 case X#exchange.entity_compare of
  201:                   strict -> Facit = Body;
  202:                   trimmed -> trim_compare(Facit, Body)
  203:                 end
  204:         end
  205:     end, Exchanges).
  206: 
  207: trim_compare(Bin1, Bin2) when is_binary(Bin1) ->
  208:   trim_compare(binary_to_list(Bin1), Bin2);
  209: trim_compare(Str1, Bin2) when is_binary(Bin2) ->
  210:   trim_compare(Str1, binary_to_list(Bin2));
  211: trim_compare(Str1, Str2) ->
  212:   S1 = string:trim(Str1),
  213:   S2 = string:trim(Str2),
  214:   S1 = S2.
  215: 
  216: hello(Config) -> ok.
  217: 
  218: catch_forward(Config) ->
  219:   run_test(#exchange{
  220:     url = "http://localhost:1029/helloworld.html",
  221:     rsp_headers = [
  222:         {"content-type", "text/html"}
  223:     ],
  224:     rsp_file = "facit.html"
  225:   }, Config).
  226: 
  227: static_get_rootfile(Config) ->
  228:     run_test(#exchange{
  229:                 url = "http://localhost:1031/rootfile.html",
  230:                 rsp_headers = [
  231:                     {"content-type", "text/html"}
  232:                 ],
  233:                 rsp_file = "facit.html"
  234:             },
  235:             Config).
  236: 
  237: static_get_subfile(Config) ->
  238:     run_test(#exchange{
  239:                 url = "http://localhost:1031/subfolder/subfile.html",
  240:                 rsp_headers = [
  241:                     {"content-type", "text/html"}
  242:                 ],
  243:                 rsp_file = "facit.html"
  244:             },
  245:             Config).
  246: 
  247: static_index_txt_welcome(Config) ->
  248:     run_test(#exchange{
  249:               url = "http://localhost:1031/subfolderwithtextindex/",
  250:               rsp_headers = [
  251:                   {"content-type", "text/plain"}
  252:               ],
  253:               rsp_file = "facit.txt"
  254:             },
  255:             Config).
  256: 
  257: static_get_rootindex(Config) ->
  258:   run_test(#exchange{
  259:             url = "http://localhost:1031/",
  260:             rsp_headers = [
  261:                 {"content-type", "text/html"}
  262:             ],
  263:             rsp_file = "facit.html"
  264:           },
  265:           Config).
  266: 
  267: static_get_subindex(Config) ->
  268:   run_test(#exchange{
  269:           url = "http://localhost:1031/subfolder",
  270:           rsp_headers = [
  271:               {"content-type", "text/html"}
  272:           ],
  273:           rsp_file = "facit.html"
  274:         },
  275:         Config).
  276: 
  277: staticlisting_list_root(Config) ->
  278:   run_test(#exchange{
  279:           url = "http://localhost:1032/",
  280:           rsp_headers = [
  281:               {"content-type", "application/xml"}
  282:           ],
  283:           rsp_file = "facit.xml",
  284:           entity_compare = trimmed
  285:         },
  286:         Config).
  287: 
  288: staticlisting_list_sub(Config) ->
  289:   run_test(#exchange{
  290:           url = "http://localhost:1032/subfolder/",
  291:           rsp_headers = [
  292:               {"content-type", "application/xml"}
  293:           ],
  294:           rsp_file = "facit.xml",
  295:           entity_compare = trimmed
  296:         },
  297:         Config).
  298: 
  299: staticlisting_prefer_welcomefile(Config) ->
  300:   run_test(#exchange{
  301:           url = "http://localhost:1032/subfolder/index.html",
  302:           rsp_headers = [
  303:               {"content-type", "text/html"}
  304:           ],
  305:           rsp_file = "facit.html"
  306:         },
  307:         Config).
  308: 
  309: xslpi_basic(Config) ->
  310:   run_test(#exchange{
  311:     url = "http://localhost:1030/docs/resource.xml",
  312:     rsp_headers = [
  313:       {"content-type", "text/xml"}
  314:     ],
  315:     rsp_file = "facit.xml"
  316:     },
  317:     Config).
  318: 
  319: accesslog_check_request_logged(Cfg) -> run_test([
  320:   #exchange{
  321:     url = "http://localhost:1028/helloworld.txt",
  322:     rsp_headers = [
  323:       {"content-type", "text/plain"}
  324:     ],
  325:     rsp_file = "facit.txt"
  326:   },
  327:   #exchange{
  328:     url = "http://localhost:1028/logs",
  329:     rsp_headers = [
  330:       {"content-type", "text/plain"}
  331:     ],
  332:     rsp_pattern = "^.*|GET /helloworld.txt| .* 200"
  333:     }
  334:   ], Cfg).
  335:   
  336:   
  337: move_file(Cfg) -> run_test([
  338:     #exchange{
  339:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldname",
  340:         rsp_pattern = <<"Hello, world!">>
  341:     },
  342:     #exchange{
  343:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/newname",
  344:         status = 404
  345:     },
  346:     #exchange{
  347:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldname",
  348:         method = delete,
  349:         req_headers = [
  350:             {"destination", "newname"},
  351:             {"overwrite", "F"},
  352:             {"x-http-method-override", "MOVE"}
  353:         ],
  354:         rsp_headers = [
  355:             {"location", "newname"}
  356:         ]
  357:     },
  358:     #exchange{
  359:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/newname",
  360:         rsp_pattern = <<"Hello, world!">>
  361:     },
  362:     #exchange{
  363:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldname",
  364:         status = 404
  365:     }], Cfg).
  366:     
  367: move_folder(Cfg) -> run_test([
  368:     #exchange{
  369:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldfolder/filename",
  370:         rsp_pattern = <<"Hello, world!">>
  371:     },
  372:     #exchange{
  373:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/newfolder/filename",
  374:         status = 404
  375:     },
  376:     #exchange{
  377:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldfolder/filename",
  378:         method = delete,
  379:         req_headers = [
  380:             {"destination", "/data/files/newfolder/filename"},
  381:             {"overwrite", "F"},
  382:             {"x-http-method-override", "MOVE"}
  383:         ],
  384:         rsp_headers = [
  385:             {"location", "/data/files/newfolder/filename"}
  386:         ]
  387:     },
  388:     #exchange{
  389:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/newfolder/filename",
  390:         rsp_pattern = <<"Hello, world!">>
  391:     },
  392:     #exchange{
  393:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldfolder/filename",
  394:         status = 404
  395:     }], Cfg).
  396: 
  397: history_unparsable_body(Cfg) ->
  398:   run_test(
  399:     #exchange{
  400:       method = post,
  401:       url = "http://localhost:1033/unparsable.xml",
  402:       status = 400,
  403:       req_headers = [
  404:         {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  405:       ],
  406:       req_body = <<"[=root&\"=lite_text&]=annan_root">>
  407:     }
  408:   ,Cfg).
  409: 
  410: history_get_latest(Cfg) -> run_test([
  411:   #exchange{
  412:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_latest.xml",
  413:     method = post,
  414:     req_headers = [
  415:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  416:     ],
  417:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=orangutang&]=apa&]=apor"
  418:   },
  419:   #exchange{
  420:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_latest.xml",
  421:     method = post,
  422:     req_headers = [
  423:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  424:     ],
  425:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=bonobo&]=apa&]=apor"
  426:   },
  427:   #exchange{
  428:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_latest.xml",
  429:     rsp_body = "<apor><apa>bonobo</apa></apor>",
  430:     entity_compare = trimmed
  431:   }
  432:   ], Cfg).
  433: 
  434: 
  435: history_get_earlier(Cfg) -> run_test([
  436:   #exchange{
  437:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_earlier.xml",
  438:     method = post,
  439:     req_headers = [
  440:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  441:     ],
  442:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=orangutang&]=apa&]=apor"
  443:   },
  444:   #exchange{
  445:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_earlier.xml",
  446:     method = post,
  447:     req_headers = [
  448:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  449:     ],
  450:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=bonobo&]=apa&]=apor"
  451:   },
  452:   #exchange{
  453:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_earlier.xml;rev=0",
  454:     rsp_body = "<apor><apa>orangutang</apa></apor>",
  455:     entity_compare = trimmed
  456:   }
  457: ], Cfg).
  458: 
  459: history_expect_conflict(Cfg) -> run_test([
  460:   #exchange{
  461:     url = "http://localhost:1033/expect_conflict.xml",
  462:     method = post,
  463:     req_headers = [
  464:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  465:     ],
  466:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=orangutang&]=apa&]=apor"
  467:   },
  468:   #exchange{
  469:     url = "http://localhost:1033/expect_conflict.xml;rev=0",
  470:     method = post,
  471:     req_headers = [
  472:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  473:     ],
  474:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=bonobo&]=apa&]=apor"
  475:   },
  476:   #exchange{
  477:     url = "http://localhost:1033/expect_conflict.xml;rev=0",
  478:     method = post,
  479:     req_headers = [
  480:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  481:     ],
  482:     status = 409,
  483:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=gorilla&]=apa&]=apor"
  484:   },
  485:   #exchange{
  486:     url = "http://localhost:1033/expect_conflict.xml",
  487:     rsp_body = "<apor><apa>bonobo</apa></apor>",
  488:     entity_compare = trimmed
  489:   }
  490: ], Cfg).
  491: 
  492: history_post_and_reread(Cfg) ->
  493:   run_test([
  494:     #exchange{
  495:       url = "http://localhost:1033/apor.xml",
  496:       method = post,
  497:       req_headers = [
  498:         {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  499:       ],
  500:       req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=orangutang&]=apa&]=apor"
  501:     },
  502:     #exchange{
  503:       url = "http://localhost:1033/apor.xml",
  504:       rsp_file = "facit.xml",
  505:       entity_compare = trimmed
  506:     }
  507:   ], Cfg).
  508: 
  509: history_empty(Config) ->
  510:   run_test(#exchange{
  511:     url = "http://localhost:1033/finns_inte.xml",
  512:     status = 404
  513:   }, Config).
  514: 
  515: vhosts_basic(Cfg) ->
  516:   run_test([#exchange{
  517:         url = "http://localhost:1035/basic/index.txt",
  518:         req_headers = [
  519:           {"accept", "text/plain"},
  520:           {"host", "orangutang"}
  521:         ],
  522:         status = 200,
  523:         rsp_body = <<"Hello Orangutan!">>
  524:   }, #exchange{
  525:         url = "http://localhost:1035/basic/index.txt",
  526:         req_headers = [
  527:           {"accept", "text/plain"},
  528:           {"host", "schimpans"}
  529:         ],
  530:         status = 200,
  531:         rsp_body = <<"Hello Chimpanzee!">>
  532:   }], Cfg).
  533: 
  534:   vhosts_subdomains(Cfg) ->
  535:     run_test([#exchange{
  536:           url = "http://localhost:1035/subdomains/index.txt",
  537:           req_headers = [
  538:             {"accept", "text/plain"},
  539:             {"host", "orangutang.jenspersson.com"}
  540:           ],
  541:           status = 200,
  542:           rsp_body = <<"Hello Orangutan!">>
  543:     }, #exchange{
  544:           url = "http://localhost:1035/subdomains/index.txt",
  545:           req_headers = [
  546:             {"accept", "text/plain"},
  547:             {"host", "schimpans.jenspersson.com"}
  548:           ],
  549:           status = 200,
  550:           rsp_body = <<"Hello Chimpanzee!">>
  551:     }], Cfg).
  552:
